Articles.Content:
You and your base fall into a timewarp to the future (same location), and Anak Krakatau erupts.

My stumpy volcanic crater.

your crater cries because it erupted and move to ground.

MY HILL!

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-01T02:07:39Z" title="10/01/2021 02:07  AM" data-short="2 yr">October 1, 2021</time> by JB182**

Tank.

Gets out and kicks you off **My Hill.**

The tanks rolls down from the hill, because it's round and empty.

(Dis/Un/De)tanked Hill

I place a rotatable washing line at the  top of the hill.

**MY HILLS HOIST.**

I sabotage the rotatable washing line. It explodes and sends you flying to the sky. While you are busy flying to the sky, i take over...

**MY HILL**

I place a giant copper dome over the hill.

***M Y  H I L L***

I take the giant dome.

*MY GIANT COPPER DOME*

I put a bigger copper dome trapping you in it.

*MY GIANTER COPPER DOME*

And I took your tanks with MechJeb 2.

*MY TANKS*

I leave and Build new hill.

My new hill

I use your tanks to move my copper hill dome and park it next to your hill.

*MY GIANTER COPPER DOME, NOW WITH NEIGHBORS.*

[@Admiral Fluffy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210816-admiral-fluffy/) and [@AtomicTech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210823-atomictech/), can ya please not be so quick and give others a chance? ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif ":mad:")
But the Hill Wars!
I was typing a comment but the two of you ruined it by posting not once, not twice, but THRICE! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif ":mad:")

> 
> 
> 13 minutes ago, AtomicTech said:
> 
> 
> I use your tanks to move my copper hill dome and park it next to your hill.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> *MY GIANTER COPPER DOME, NOW WITH NEIGHBORS.*
> 

i crashed a rocket on your hill.

MY HILL!

I take the Shrinking Ray from Despicable Me and shrink the rocket! Now that it has been shrank to the size of around a very much used pen, i can easily crush it under my foot. Now that there's nothing making the hill yours, it is easy for me to take it and proclaim it...

**MY HILL**

The shrinked everything gets covered with a Copper Bowl , a minor sibling of the Copper Dome.

Hill Covered With Copper Bowl.

Spoiler

"To get covered with a copper bowl" - the Russian idiom for "to get totally and dramatically gone"

You didn't even take it for yourself. It's still my hill regardless

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-01T15:03:14Z" title="10/01/2021 03:03  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 1, 2021</time> by Maria Sirona**

I sneak off with the planet that has all the hills, place a cloaking field around it and put it in some random spot in the solar system.

**MY GIANT GAME OF BATTLESHIP USING <abbr title="Ascending Node">AN</abbr> ENTIRE PLANET AS THE HIDDEN BATTLESHIP, HILLS.**

The hosting is down. Your MMORPG doesn't respond.

Silent Hill.
**MY VERY QUIET GIANT GAME OF BATTLESHIP USING <abbr title="Ascending Node"><abbr title="Ascending Node">AN</abbr></abbr> ENTIRE PLANET AS THE HIDDEN BATTLESHIP, HILLS.**
E5
C4
Explosive Hill

Bucket o' water a la Minecraft.

I have a P.R.A.W.N. Suit, 

*MY UNDERWATER, SUBNAUTICA-THEMED,* 

*DOME!!*
